$schema: Version manifest for Code Tutor course content
description: Pinned version targets for all courses. Auditors verify content against these versions. When auditing a course, check code examples and API references against the runtime and framework versions listed here.
note: Framework versions are baseline targets from project planning. Each course audit phase should re-verify latest stable versions at audit start and update lastVerified accordingly.

frameworks.name: Spring Boot
frameworks.notes: Spring Framework 7, Jakarta EE 11, virtual threads default. First-class Java 25 support.

frameworks.name: Gradle
frameworks.notes: Build tool used throughout course

frameworks.name: JUnit
frameworks.notes: Testing framework for all Java modules

frameworks.name: JPA/Hibernate
frameworks.notes: ORM for database modules. Ships with Spring Boot 4.0.x

frameworks.name: Jackson
frameworks.notes: JSON serialization/deserialization. Ships with Spring Boot 4.0.x

runtime.name: Python
runtime.notes: Minimum 3.12; content may reference 3.13+ features where noted

frameworks.name: FastAPI
frameworks.notes: Primary web framework; verify latest stable at audit time

frameworks.name: Django
frameworks.notes: Secondary web framework covered in later modules

frameworks.name: SQLAlchemy
frameworks.notes: ORM and database toolkit

frameworks.name: Pydantic
frameworks.notes: Data validation, used with FastAPI

frameworks.name: pytest
frameworks.notes: Testing framework

frameworks.name: Alembic
frameworks.notes: Database migrations with SQLAlchemy

runtime.name: .NET
runtime.notes: Course written for .NET 9/C# 13. Both .NET 8 and .NET 9 EOL November 2026. .NET 10 LTS available; upgrade planned for future cycle.

frameworks.name: ASP.NET Core
frameworks.notes: Web framework. Built-in OpenAPI support (MapOpenApi). Minimal API patterns.

frameworks.name: Entity Framework Core
frameworks.notes: ORM. HybridCache, compiled models. Course uses code-first migrations.

frameworks.name: Blazor
frameworks.notes: Interactive UI framework. Server and WebAssembly rendering modes.

frameworks.name: xUnit
frameworks.notes: Testing framework

frameworks.name: .NET Aspire
frameworks.notes: Cloud-native orchestration. Aspire 13.0 released for .NET 10; course targets 9.x for .NET 9.

frameworks.name: Bun
frameworks.notes: Alternative runtime and package manager. Course verified against Bun 1.3.x. Bun-specific APIs (bun:sqlite, bun:ffi) in Modules 19-20.

frameworks.name: Hono
frameworks.notes: Lightweight web framework. alg option required in jwt() middleware since 4.11.0.

frameworks.name: React
frameworks.notes: Frontend UI library. Course uses React 19 patterns (hooks, functional components).

frameworks.name: Prisma
frameworks.notes: Prisma 7.0 released (ESM-first, no Rust engines); course stays on 6.x patterns. Upgrade when ecosystem stabilizes.

frameworks.name: TypeScript
frameworks.notes: Used throughout course alongside JavaScript

runtime.name: Kotlin
runtime.notes: K2 compiler default since 2.0. Kotlin 2.3.0 stable (Dec 2025). Context parameters Beta since 2.2. Course content uses 2.3.0 features.

frameworks.name: Ktor
frameworks.notes: Server-side web framework. Ktor 3.4.0 (Jan 2026). Course uses ktor-server-core-jvm, ktor-server-cio-jvm, ktor-server-content-negotiation-jvm, ktor-server-auth-jwt-jvm.

frameworks.name: Compose Multiplatform
frameworks.notes: Cross-platform UI framework. iOS stable since 1.8 (May 2025). Hot reload since 1.10 (Jan 2026).

frameworks.name: SQLDelight
frameworks.notes: Multiplatform database library. Type-safe SQL queries, migrations, reactive data flows.

frameworks.name: Koin
frameworks.notes: Dependency injection framework. KMP support with annotations DSL.

frameworks.name: Exposed
frameworks.notes: JetBrains ORM for Ktor. 1.0.0 GA (Jan 2026). R2DBC support added. Used in Module 06 for database operations.

frameworks.name: Arrow
frameworks.notes: Functional programming library. Context parameters API in arrow.core.raise.context. Typed errors with Raise DSL.

frameworks.name: kotlinx-coroutines
frameworks.notes: Structured concurrency. Used throughout course for async operations.

frameworks.name: kotlinx-serialization
frameworks.notes: Multiplatform serialization. Used with Ktor for JSON content negotiation.

frameworks.name: Gradle
frameworks.notes: Build tool with Kotlin DSL

runtime.name: Flutter
runtime.notes: Course targets Flutter 3.38/Dart 3.10. Dot shorthands (Dart 3.10) used in content. Impeller default on iOS and Android API 29+.

frameworks.name: Riverpod
frameworks.notes: State management. Course teaches Notifier/AsyncNotifier patterns (2.x API). These work in Riverpod 3.x via legacy imports. Riverpod 4.0 expected; migration deferred.

frameworks.name: GoRouter
frameworks.notes: Declarative routing. Requires Flutter 3.32+/Dart 3.8+.

frameworks.name: Dart Frog
frameworks.notes: Backend framework. Community-maintained since July 2025 (was VGV). API stable and unchanged (1.0.0 -> 1.2.6).

frameworks.name: Serverpod
frameworks.notes: Full-stack Dart server framework. Course teaches 2.x patterns. Serverpod 3.0 released Dec 2025 with new auth system (Relic) and web server; migration deferred to future cycle.

frameworks.name: Drift
frameworks.notes: Local SQLite database with type-safe queries. Compatible within 2.x line.
